title: Snapchat beta reveals “cheerios” selfie drone is still on track, ability to mute location coming soon too
content:
Snapchat may not be the most popular instant messaging app around, but it still has a fairly loyal userbase comprising mostly of younger adults within its demographics. Lately, Snapchat was also one of the partners of choice for Google, with the Pixel 6 series getting an exclusive “Quick Tap to Snap” feature. With the Pixel

The post Snapchat beta reveals “cheerios” selfie drone is still on track, ability to mute location coming soon too appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The latest Snapchat beta indicates that work is still on for Snap's selfie drone codenamed "cheerios". Read on to know more!
